extendedInfo.description: Create research papers for schools and colleges quickly. Enter the area of research and application will displays best videos, expert ideas and books on Science, Engineering, Technology, Astronomy, Math, Business and Religions of the world.  Create your own version for school or college submission leveraging the information. Learn from reports submitted by your peers on diverse educational topics such as life sciences, physical sciences, natural sciences, algebra, geometry, business management, computers, networking, world religions and any other topics of interestApplication Features 1] Best scientific information from experts in the field2] Papers and reports submitted by your peers3] Best videos on the topic to have fun while learning4] Related Books on the subject5] Ability to search for any topic of your choiceSubject Include: Abrahamic religionsAlgebraSolar SystemUniverseVisionariesSoftware EngineeringScientistsProgramming LanguagesPhysical SciencesPetroleumOriginOrganization ManagementOperating Systems and SecurityAnalysisApplied MathematicsApplied MathematicsBiologicalBusiness ConceptsBusiness LeadersCivilComputer Architecture and SystemsComputer Science BasicsDatabases and Data StructureDepartment ManagementEast Asian religionsElectricalFinancialGeometryHistorical polytheismIndian religionsIndigenous traditional religionsIndustrialInternet and MultimediaIranian religionsLife SciencesMaterialsMechanicalNatural SciencesNetworkingNew Age

reviews.title: Initial review
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app for 30 seconds and felt it deserved 5 stars instantly.  More news if i ever update this review.
reviews.author: Vellocent C.

reviews.title: \"internet connection may be down\" but the WiFi is conected
reviews.comment: I love the concept and immediately installed it on my Samsung phone. I get a message that says my \"internet connection may be down\

reviews.title: Great educational app
reviews.comment: Best one stop info on multiple topics. Helps with the homework and researching topics fast.
reviews.author: A Google User
